title: Remove the "Experimental" warnings from search.function package
description: I am using this package for a while, seems that others in this list use it too, so let's remove those warnings.

comments.content: I think we should resolve LUCENE-1085 first and move this to 2.4?
comments.author: Michael Busch

comments.content:
I think we should resolve LUCENE-1085 first and move this to 2.4?
Done.
comments.author: Doron Cohen

comments.content:
Simon: You wanted to redo the function stuff? If this is the case, we should move this to later and keep it experimental for 3.0

Uwe
comments.author: Uwe Schindler

comments.content:
Functions still need some love I guess. I would prefer to move this out and do work on 3.1. Seems kind of ambiguous to "un-experimentalize"   this in the 3.0 release anyway.

moving out
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content: this should be taken care of within LUCENE-2883.
comments.author: Doron Cohen
